DOC.brief_summary: Clinical, prospective, single-center, national trial. open and randomized at 1: 1 to compare the rate of bacteremia associated between non-tunneled Central venous catheter and peripheral inserted central catheter.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Bacteraemia Between Peripherally Inserted and Central Inserted Catheters.
